title: Park Lane Residencies - Twin Unit
details:
Park Lane" occupies a specious 5 acre plot of land, consisting of 2 types of buildings. Through the concept of nature & modernism for 21st century lifestyle, the design of each unit allows you the best panoramic view of the paddy fields and some of them have views of the pool.

Ground floor – Twin Car parking ,Bedroom & Bathrooms,
First Floor – Living & Dining, Pantry, 1 Bathroom, front and rear Balcony
Second floor – 2 large rooms with Attached bathrooms, Front and rear balconies
Rooftop – 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, Utility area and Roof Terrace

Gymnasium
Club house
Common Swimming Pool with kiddies pool
Roof Terrace
Car Park for 2 vehicles
LED Lighting for better energy efficiency
Corridors that reflect natural light and ventilation
Jogging Track
24 hour security & CCTV Camera System and Backup Generator for Common Areas
Central garbage room
Laundry Facility
Vehicle Washing Bay
